pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spline Estimation for GPLSIM // We provides functions that employ splines to estimate generalized partially linear single index models (GPLSIM), which extend the generalized linear models to include nonlinear effect for some predictors. Please see Y. (2017) at doi:10.1007/s11222-016-9639-0 and Y., and R. (2002) at doi:10.1198/016214502388618861 for more details.
